update evaluation set content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, article_id = #{articleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, enjoy = #{enjoy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, disable_reason = #{disableReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, disable_time = #{disableTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where evaluation_id = #{evaluationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
